Former NOTW editor Andy Coulson resigned as the Prime Minister's head of communications, saying the drip-drip of claims about illegal eavesdropping under his editorship meant he could not "give the 110 per cent needed". I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on, he added.
